text: William Trevor Rowlands (7 May 1904 – 18 May 1984) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He was also a cricketer and played six first-class matches for Western Australia between 1937/38 and 1938/39. ==See also== * List of Western Australia first-class cricketers == Notes == == External links == * *Trevor Rowlands's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1904 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:University Blacks Football Club players Category:Australian cricketers Category:Western Australia cricketers
title: Trevor Rowlands (Australian footballer)
